title: The Right Attitude to Rain
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: 'The National Library of Scotland,'  said Joe, buttering a slice of toast. He applied only butter, scrupulously  avoiding the open jar of Marmite which Isabel had placed in front of him.

title: The Right Attitude to Rain
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: 'Yes,' said Joe. 'I intend to spend the day in the National Library of Scotland. And no  thank  you,  I  don't  like Marmite.'
